LanguageData.Ship_Beam.label: avaruusaluksen rakennepalkki
LanguageData.Ship_Beam.description: Rakennepalkki, jonka ympärille avaruusaluksen voi rakentaa.
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Blueprint.label: ship structural beam (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Frame.label: ship structural beam (building)
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Frame.description: A structural beam around which a ship can be constructed.
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket.label: avaruusaluksen salauniarkku
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket.description: Ulkoavaruuden vaaroja vastaan kovennettu salauniarkku. Kykenee ylläpitämään yhden hengen salaunessa vuosisatojen ajan avaruudessa ja selviämään ilmakehään palaamisesta.
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket_Blueprint.label: ship cryptosleep casket (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket_Frame.label: ship cryptosleep casket (building)
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepCasket_Frame.description: A cryptosleep casket hardened against the dangers of space. Capable of maintaining a person in cryptosleep for centuries in a space environment and surviving atmospheric re-entry.
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore.label: avaruusaluksen tietokoneydin
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore.description: Yli-inhimillisen tekoälyn varastoimiseen kykenevä tietokoneydin. Tekoäly pystyy selvittämään minkä tahansa haasteen.
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore_Blueprint.label: ship computer core (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore_Frame.label: ship computer core (building)
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore_Frame.description: A computer core capable of housing a superhumanlike AI who can guide a ship through any challenge.
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor.label: avaruusaluksen reaktori
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor.description: Tuo alukselle virtaa sen matkalle avaruuden halki.
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor_Blueprint.label: ship reactor (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor_Frame.label: ship reactor (building)
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor_Frame.description: Powers a ship on its journey through space.
LanguageData.Ship_Engine.label: avaruusaluksen moottori
LanguageData.Ship_Engine.description: Antimaterialla toimiva moottori, joka kykenee laukaisemaan aluksen kiertoradalle ja tähtienvälisille lentoradoille.
LanguageData.Ship_Engine_Blueprint.label: ship engine (blueprint)
LanguageData.Ship_Engine_Frame.label: ship engine (building)
LanguageData.Ship_Engine_Frame.description: An engine capable of launching a ship into orbit and on interstellar trajectories.
